The credit card fee victory is a defeat (permalink) The headline was pure David and Goliath: America's small businesses had finally triumphed in their 20-year litigation campaign against Visa and Mastercard over price-gouging on fees, and V/MC were going to cough up $30B as reparations: https://edition.cnn.com/2024/03/26/economy/visa-mastercard-swipe-fee-settlement/index.html But if you actually delve into that settlement, the victory gets very hollow indeed.
